function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the MedTech sector.","Impact":"Increased reliance on digital tools may lead to privacy and security risks, as well as potential technological failures.","Mitigation":"Implement robust security measures and privacy protections, as well as regular testing and maintenance of digital tools.","Technologies":"Secure communication platforms, encryption technologies, and regular software updates.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and MedTech companies.","Owner":"MedTech companies, healthcare providers, and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","Impact":"Loss of in-person interaction may impact patient-provider relationships and increase the risk of misdiagnosis or missed symptoms.","Mitigation":"Provide training for healthcare providers on effective remote consultation practices and ensure clear communication with patients about the limitations of remote consultations.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, communication tools, and training programs.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and healthcare administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, healthcare administrators, and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","Impact":"Lack of thorough governance and integration may lead to data breaches, privacy violations, and regulatory non-compliance.","Mitigation":"Establish clear governance policies and procedures, conduct regular audits of digital systems, and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Data security and encryption technologies, governance software, and compliance management tools.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and MedTech companies.","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, regulatory bodies, and MedTech companies."}]}
